title: App Crashes While click on the settings option.
body:
#### Expected behavior The App should be able to open the settings. #### Actual behavior When we click on settings option app Crashes and we are not able to open the settings. #### How to reproduce + Launch the app. + Click on the menu at the top of the right corner of the app you see different options there. + Click on settings, app Crashes and you are not able to open the settings. * Application : A Photo Manager. Version :0.6.4.180314 * Operating system: Android Nought (7.0) #### Recording Of The Bug https://youtu.be/T5hKhGOzV4A
Posted on Utopian.io - Rewarding Open Source Contributors
comments: Fixed in next f-droid hotfix release v0.6.4.180321
